DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see well alendronate calcium compare calcium alone increase bone density postmenopausal woman osteoporosis
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Efficacy Alendronate With Without Calcium Calcium Alone In Treatment Osteoporosis Postmenopausal Women ( 0217-088 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Patient postmenopausal ( surgically menopausal ) least 5 year . Patient must diagnose osteoporosis Patient spinal anatomy suitable DEXA lumbar spine Exclusion Criteria : Patient receive receive treatment prior randomization might influence bone turnover Patient history evidence metabolic bone disease ( postmenopausal bone loss ) Patient receive expect receive course study medication ( study medication ) might alter bone calcium metabolism
